feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.6 Improved signature functionality and drag-and-drop bug fixes
entry.content:
Improved signature functionality and file drag-and-drop bug fixes

We also now sign our docker images for easy verification for anyone that needs that :)

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Update .pre-commit-config.yaml by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2525
  • Fix file drag and drop by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2575

Enhancements

  • Update and improve zh_TW Traditional Chinese locale by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2513
  • Standardize Alpine base image format and version across all Dockerfiles by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2540
  • Feature/improved signature element by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2489

Minor Enhancements

  • standardize the submit button by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2509
  • formattingand autowired constructors by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2557
  • Fixes SSO login rejection by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2566

Docker Updates

  • Bump gradle from 8.11-jdk17 to 8.12-jdk17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2517
  • Docker labels by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2536

Translation Changes

  • Adding the missing translations in French by @crownbackend in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2563
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2579
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2582
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2583

Other Changes

  • remove redundant entries by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2507
  • Bump springBootVersion from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2522
  • Bump io.spring.dependency-management from 1.1.6 to 1.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2523
  • Bump org.springframework.boot from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2524
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2526
  • [Security] Dangerous-Workflow by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2532
  • used pre-commit/action by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2548
  • rollback check_properties.yml by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2551
  • Fix: duplicated mapping key by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2550
  • extends the .gitignore for cert and ssh by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2572
  • Bump gradle from 8.11-jdk17 to 8.12-jdk17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2556

New Contributors

  • @step-security-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2516
  • @crownbackend made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2563

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.5...v0.36.6

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.37.1 PDF compression improvement and minor fixes
entry.content:
• Fixes for PDF compression
  • image-to-PDF URL issues on homepage fixed
  • Improved translations
  • Dependency updates

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix img to pdf url by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2719
  • Fix PDF compression sizing by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2720

Enhancements

  • Add: description for compress optimization levels 6 to 9 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2687

Translation Changes

  • Update and improve Portuguese locale using Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2682
  • Update and improve Hindi (‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä) (hi_IN) locale using Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2702
  • Update and improve Greek(ŒïŒªŒªŒ∑ŒΩŒπŒ∫Œ¨)(el_GR) locale using Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2716
  • Update german translation by @fussel132 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2721
  • Update & improve Russian(–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π/ru_RU) locale w/ Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2717

Other Changes

  • ü§ñ format everything with pre-commit by by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2685
  • Bump com.opencsv:opencsv from 5.9 to 5.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2696
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.14.2 to 1.14.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2694
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2701
  • commit to trigger GHA by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2708
  • version bump by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2722
  • Add possible fix to desktop UIs by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2726

New Contributors

  • @fussel132 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2721

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.37.0...v0.37.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.38.0 PDF to Markdown!
entry.content:
This release includes the much wanted PDF to markdown feature along with bug fixes and various language updates!

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix displayed identical fonts in sign PDF by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2751

Enhancements

  • outdated Gradle functions to the Gradle 9.0 standard by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2740

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2711
  • Fix redaction buttons tooltips by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2750

Translation Changes

  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2731
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2734
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2736
  • Update and improve zh_TW Traditional Chinese locale by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2739
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2745
  • Update and improve Korean(ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥)(ko_KR) locale using Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2741

Other Changes

  • version bump by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2752

New Contributors

  • @carliblaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2733
  • @stirlingbot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2711

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.37.1...v0.38.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.39.0 Memory cleanup and new APIs
entry.content:
Memory Cleanup (garbage collection) changes to improve memory usage of Stirling-PDF post operation

Added new API endpoints for users wanting to use stirling-pdf via their own scripts such as /api/v1/analysis/page-count and /api/v1/analysis/page-dimensions

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Switch order of literals to prevent NullPointerException by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2769

Minor Enhancements

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2765
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2788

Translation Changes

  • Update and improve Czech(ƒåesky)(cs_CZ) locale using Claude 3.5 Sonnet by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2748
  • Fix fr messages by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2773

Other Changes

  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2758
  • Bump bouncycastleVersion from 1.79 to 1.80 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2759
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-jdbc from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2760
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2786

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.38.0...v0.39.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.40.0 Brand new Homepage!
entry.content:
Brand new homepage update! Please let us know what you think, For now we maintaining old homepage in parallel while we get people's reviews! Will delete based on feedback

What's Changed

  • Homepage update by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2663

Minor Enhancements

  • ü§ñ format everything with pre-commit by by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2794
  • Posthog to log to log file by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2813
  • [Fix] Handle missing end page in PDF split range by @Abdurrahman-shaikh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2816
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2810
  • Deprecated attribute th:include by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2827
  • Config rework by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2823
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2829

Docker Updates

  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.12.0 to 6.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2800

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2804
  • (i18n) Updated Irish translations by @aindriu80 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2793
  • Update messages_pt_BR.properties by @thiagoor-cpu in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2815
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2811
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2819

Other Changes

  • Bump testdriverai/action from 1.0.0 to 1.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2801
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.1 to 3.28.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2802
  • Bump actions/stale from 9.0.0 to 9.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2803
  • Bump pdfboxVersion from 3.0.3 to 3.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2790
  • Bump org.postgresql:postgresql from 42.7.4 to 42.7.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2757
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2809
  • Update PR-Demo-cleanup.yml by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2817
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2822
  • :globe_with_meridians: Sync Translations + Update README Progress Table + Update Verification Metadata by @stirlingbot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2830
  • Version bump by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2820

New Contributors

  • @Abdurrahman-shaikh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2816
